description:
Lindel is the current caretaker of the Dragons` Aerie, which was appointed to him by the one who named him and teacher, http://anidb.net/ch92682 [Rahab]. He served as both http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Elias] and Adolf`s first master. His title is Echoes, Song of Flowers and has lived for hundreds of years.
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki
name: Lindel
